description: Pallet wood is typically pine or oak that is used to build pallets for storage and shipping applications.
short desc: Pallet wood is typically pine or oak that is used to build pallets for storage and shipping applications.
source: Samples cut from pallets used for fire training ground.

measured property.test description: Mass loss rate [kg/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.
